title: Sound On: NH 2020 Debate Preview, Jobs Report
itunes:title: Sound On: NH 2020 Debate Preview, Jobs Report
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.



Panel Guests: Mattie Duppler, Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union and former Former Coalitions Director for the House Republican Conference, Cate Martel, National political reporter at the Hill and author of the Hill's 12:30 report, and Scott Ferson, Democratic strategist and founder of the Liberty Square Group PR firm and The Blue Lab, a local political candidate incubator.


Kevin also spoke with Matt Mowers, Republican candidate for Congress in New Hampshire's 1st district and former senior White House advisor for the State Department about his candidacy.


To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
